name: Twist My Arm(agnac)

ingredients.item: Compressed pineapple core or cube of pineapple.

preparation:
After one sip of this pineapple-spiked drink from San Francisco’s Dirty Habit, you won’t need any more coaxing.

Add all ingredients to a shaker and fill with ice.

Shake, and strain into a rocks glass over one large ice cube.

Garnish with a compressed pineapple core or a cube of pineapple.
